features: Push toy vacuum with music, lights, and educational phrases to encourage your baby to push and play
Flip the switch “on” for vacuum sounds; switch “off” for learning songs and phrases that teach colors, counting and more
Press the light-up canister button for more fun songs and phrases
Adjustable designtilt it up or down for the perfect fit.
Helps strengthen gross motor skills and encourage early role-play for infants and toddlers ages 1-3 years
body.description: Product Description Clean up time has never been more fun than with the Laugh & Learn Light-up Learning Vacuum push toy from Fisher-Price! When your toddler pushes the toy vacuum along, bright lights and learning songs and phrases will introduce colors, counting, and more. Flip the 'power' switch up and actual vacuum sounds let your tiny helper really get into the role play fun! Brand Story To give your child the best possible start in life, you don’t have to have all the answers or do things a certain way. All you have to do is the best you can, and let your kids play. At Fisher-Price, we’re dedicated to helping you do just that by working tirelessly to bring you the very best gear and toys. Fisher-Price toys are made to help all kids—from infants to toddlers to preschoolers—develop through play, in their own ways, because that’s how they learn best at each age and stage. And for babies, our gear offers simple solutions (more sleep, anyone?!) you can’t possibly parent without.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: For the Best Possible Start To give your child the best possible start in life, you don’t have to have all the answers or do things a certain way. All you have to do is the best you can, and let your kids play. At Fisher-Price, we’re dedicated to helping you do just that by working tirelessly to bring you the very best gear and toys. Fisher-Price toys are made to help all kids—from infants to toddlers to preschoolers—develop through play, in their own ways, because that’s how they learn best at each age and stage. Fisher-Price Laugh & Learn Light-up Learning Vacuum Clean up time has never been more fun! When your toddler pushes the vacuum along, bright lights and learning songs and phrases will introduce colors, counting, and more. Flip the power switch up and actual vacuum sounds let your tiny helper really get into the role play fun! Where development comes into play; Academics: Playful songs and phrases introduce counting, colors, shapes, opposites, and more Gross Motor: As your baby pushes the vacuum here, there, and everywhere, they're developing important gross motor skills like balance and coordination Creativity & Imagination: The realistic design and sound effects encourages early role play and imaginative fun as your little one pretends to clean house!

'Fill up' on learning fun! With two sound settings, a multi-color, light-up canister, and an adjustable design, this push-along toy vacuum lets little ones fill up on lots of learning and imaginative fun! Flip the 'power' switch up for real vacuum sounds, or down for learning songs and phrases, and press the canister button for more songs about shapes, numbers, and working together.

Where early academics come into play The Laugh & Learn Light-Up Learning Vacuum features a variety of songs, sounds, and phrases that introduce early learning concepts. Numbers & Colors: As kids 'vacuum' and press the button, they'll hear songs that encourage counting 1-10 and reinforce color learning as the canister lights up in different colors as they're sung. Opposites: Little ones can start up the cleaning and opposite fun by giving the 'power' switch a flip to hear phrases and music that keep the learning humming along!

See the fun develop As your baby grows, simple prompts such as, 'Can you vacuum next to the chair?' will help keep the early role play rolling! Plus, the real vacuum sounds help power up the fun, making your little one feel like they're using the real thing!

Features Flip the switch 'on' for vacuum sounds & 'off' for learning songs & phrases Press the light-up canister button for more fun songs & phrases Dial clicker for hands-on fun Adjustable design—tilt it up or down for the perfect fit!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice but very small
reviews.reviewText: This is a cute little noisy vacuum glad it’s not staying at my house. It’s very short so if your 1 year old is taller go with the Leap Frog vacuum. Great for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter bought one for her grandson, my ggs. (1 year old) He loved it! My ggd saw it, she is 9 months, and started playing with it, too, so I bought her one, to.It's well made, makes vaccuum sound and also plays different songs. Just as cute as can be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and fun
reviews.reviewText: My son always tried stealing my vacuum when I was using it. I thought he would still try if I gave him this, but nope. He only wants his little vacuum. He loves it so much and feels like he is helping mommy. I love seeing him so proud of himself after we vacuum together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than expected
reviews.reviewText: This is a cute and durable toy. My baby loves it, but wish it was a little taller. The lights and singing the toy does keeps the kids attention for a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No off button
reviews.reviewText: First the only negative it comes already talking and singing in the box cuz it has no off switch. Sure it comes with the batteries but y they are installed is insanely weird. Poor delivery people. If you are buying for you child you would not surprise them if they hear it when it's delivered. The power button is pretend as shown in ad and it makes diff sounds depending on up or down switchNow it is exactly the size described. It's an early learning toy so I think it's perfect for those just starting to walk. The colors are great. It has a typically annoying voice that kids love and parents tolerate. I think it's adorable and a great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Our son has loved the vacuum since birth and now has his very own at 15 months! He loves to push it around while we vacuum and also loves the on and off switch! The songs are catchy but not annoying like some other unnamed toys have. Great for the early walkers and the kiddos who love the vacuums!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute, too small, not a winner
reviews.reviewText: Gifted this to my 2-year-old nephew who loves playing with the real hand-held vacuums - he could not have cared less with this one. A bit disappointing; I thought there'd be an actual vacuum noise as they move it around (vs jingles, but maybe I misread the description). It doesn't stand up and is a bit on the smaller side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Little Toy
reviews.reviewText: It was a bit smaller than I expected - but great for our 11 month old grandson who has been walking since he was 9 months old.
This little vacuum is really cute. But it is very small. I didn’t think it would be so tiny. It’s the perfect size for a 1 year old not much older or taller than that though. But my son likes it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Granddaughter has cleaned every room in our house!!! Great loud sounds and educational. Great purchase.
consegna rapida, ben fatto, robusto agli urti,bellissimo e il bimbo di 1 anno ci gioca un sacco .ha canzoncine e funzione rumore aspirapolvere come fosse vera.

Ich habe nach einen Sauger für unseren gerade ein Jahr gewordenen Sohn gesucht. So, nun haben wir ihn eine Weile und ich kann nur sagen, er ist toll.- Die Grösse ist für diese Altersgruppe perfekt. Somit lässt er sich super durch die Wohnung schieben.- Der Sauger ist absolut robust und sieht immernoch aus wie neu und funktioniert einwandfrei.- Ja, die Musik ist auf Englisch. Interessiert mein Kind überhaupt nicht. Er benutzt ihn wenn ich auch sauge und legt ihn danach zu unserem Sauger. Manchmal tanzt er dazu, oft macht er ihn garnicht an und schiebt ihn immer fleißig hinter mir her 🙂Er liebt das Gerät und kann es kaum erwarten mit mir zu saugen. Hat so viel Spaß damit.
